dct_title_s: Pierhead and bulkhead lines for the east, west and north shores of Newark Bay, New Jersey, extending on the east shore from the approved lines at Bergen Neck to the N.Y. & N.R.R. bridge across the Hackensack River; on the west shore from the approved lines at Elizabethport to the N.Y. & N.R.R bridge across the Passaic River; and on the north shore from the N.Y. & N.R.R. bridge across the Hackensack River to the N.Y. & N.R.R. bridge across the Passaic River.
dct_description_sm: Survey map showing the approved pierhead and bulkhead lines at Newark Bay, and the Waverly and New York Rail Road Company
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Source map is a reverse printing. This record includes both the original and inverted images.
